      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a new instance of the RegularPolygon class that is a triangle with center at (0, 0) and a side length of 100 pixels.
      RegularPolygon(double x, double y, int numSides, double sideLength)
      Creates a new instance of the RegularPolygon class with a specified number of sides, specified side length, and center coordinates at (x, y).

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Creates a new instance of the RegularPolygon class that is a triangle with center at (0, 0) and a side length of 100 pixels.
        Precondition:
        The default sets the polygon to have no fill and a black border of width 1.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(double x,
                      double y,
                      int numSides,
                      double sideLength)
        Creates a new instance of the RegularPolygon class with a specified number of sides, specified side length, and center coordinates at (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the center of the RegularPolygon.
        y - The y-coordinate of the center of the RegularPolygon.
        numSides - The number of sides the RegularPolygon object has.
        sideLength - The pixel length of each side.
        Precondition:
        The default sets the polygon to have no fill and a black border of width 1.
